animeTitle: Persona 4 the Golden Animation: Thank you Mr. Accomplice
animeDescription: After Yuu finds out the past and circumstances of Adachi, he makes a single decision in order to save him.  (Source: ANN)  This is an alternate ending to the Persona 4 The Golden Animation series.
animeCharacters: ['Narukami, Yuu', 'Adachi, Tooru', 'Shirogane, Naoto', 'Hanamura, Yousuke', 'Kujikawa, Rise', 'Tatsumi, Kanji', 'Amagi, Yukiko', 'Marie']
